about_the_game:
Welcome to Becut, a thrilling social deduction party game, perfect for family nights or evenings with friends. Designed for 4 to 12 players, this game transports you to a constantly changing castle, where each game is a race against time to prepare Becut's garbure.

Hidden roles


In Becut, each player has a crucial role: either help prepare the garbure or secretly try to sabotage it by adding poisoned ingredients. When Becut tastes the garbure, if it is not finished, or worse, if it has been poisoned, he flies into a rage and goes on a hunt. Beware if you encounter him in this state...

Procedural generation


The castle, generated procedurally, ensures that no two games are alike. Your memory and sense of direction will be your best tools for navigating the winding corridors and hidden rooms of the castle.

Powers


At the start of each game, powers are scattered throughout the castle. They will allow you to obtain additional information about other players or to perform advantageous actions. But be careful, traitors can also get their hands on these powers...
